amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to accept, consider, or rely on third-party intentional dosing human studies for pesticides.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for continuing the ban on using humans for testing of pestcides.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
